mapper.select:
select symbol, trading_date, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price, volume, market from sto_his_price where 1=1
and symbol = upper(#{symbol})
order by trading_date asc
mapper.insert:
insert into sto_his_price ( symbol, trading_date, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price, volume, market )
values ( #{symbol}, #{trading_date}, #{open_price}, #{high_price}, #{low_price}, #{close_price}, #{volume}, #{market} )
